languages.text: "Я отправлю этот подарок в сокровищницу. Может, однажды ты передумаешь и решишь его принять".
"I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."
languages.original_text: "Я отправлю этот подарок в сокровищницу. Может, однажды ты передумаешь и решишь его принять".

traits.locale_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."
"I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."
"I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."
"I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

languages.text: “我准备把这件礼物放在国库里。或许有朝一日，你会改变心意，再次接受这件礼物。”
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: “我准备把这件礼物放在国库里。或许有朝一日，你会改变心意，再次接受这件礼物。”

languages.text: 「この贈り物を国庫に送ることにしよう。もしかしたら、また気が変わって受け取ってくれるかもしれないからな」
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: 「この贈り物を国庫に送ることにしよう。もしかしたら、また気が変わって受け取ってくれるかもしれないからな」

languages.text: «Enviaré este regalo a la tesorería. Tal vez cambie de opinión y decida aceptarlo».
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: «Enviaré este regalo a la tesorería. Tal vez cambie de opinión y decida aceptarlo».

languages.text: « Je vais faire ranger ce cadeau dans le trésor. Vous changerez peut-être d'avis un jour et l'accepterez à nouveau. »
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais faire ranger ce cadeau dans le trésor. Vous changerez peut-être d'avis un jour et l'accepterez à nouveau. »

languages.text: "Ich werde das Geschenk zur Schatzkammer bringen lassen. Vielleicht überlegt Ihr es Euch noch mal und nehmt es wieder an."
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das Geschenk zur Schatzkammer bringen lassen. Vielleicht überlegt Ihr es Euch noch mal und nehmt es wieder an."

languages.text: "Bu armağanı hazineye göndereceğim. Belki fikrini değiştirirsin ve tekrar kabul edersin."
languages.original_text: "I shall send this gift to the treasury. Perhaps you will change your mind and accept it again."

traits.locale_text: "Bu armağanı hazineye göndereceğim. Belki fikrini değiştirirsin ve tekrar kabul edersin."
